title: Occasionally cannot load login screen
body:
Oftentimes, when booting up league of legends, during the loading of the login screen the logins screen turns white. The text "Failed to load URL "https://riot:xfb2SaEeaKzpuZDQZiNBxg@127.0.0.1:49305/index.html"" appears on the top of the screen. Clicking the link in the client does nothing, and the text cannot be selected. Clicking the link in the preview while typing this gives a message that the area the link goes to is insecure, and people might try to steal my information there, i'm not sure if that's relevant or not, but I think it is worth mentioning.

Deleting the page via Windows Task Manager then attempting to boot league again gives a message saying that league is already running, which it is not, and thus i cannot boot up league. Restarting the computer fixes this latter problem, and usually the white screen problem as well, but unfortunately it sometimes does not fix the "Failed to load" problem.

I am tired of occasionally being wholly unable to play league some days because the login screen won't load. Does anyone know the solution to this problem?

replies.body:
Hmmm... It certainly sounds like your connection to that server or others could be blocked or depreciated by certain local network configurations. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help you configure your settings for League properly.

If you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps, we can investigate further.

Thank you, i will try that next time I have this problem.

I'm surprised that I got a red to comment on my post too.
